title: Generative Fashion Design
description: At Zalando, we target an agile design process that combines invaluable human experience with the power of Machine Learning (ML). In particular, we do research on novel ways to use generative models in fashion design for rapid visualizations and prototyping. One such ML model is the Generative Adversarial Network (GAN).
